name: LD45 - Catch the money
description:
Hello Jammers!

This is my first jam, so I think the timing is quite okay :smile:
And both of us are just happy and proud to commit a game at all :)

So here is our little capitalistic game. You start with nothing and collect money because..it's money. Yay! :)

Its look and feel is inspired by the classic game "Moohrhuhn schießen", so the genre is Shoot'em up.
(Moorhuhn is a German casual game franchise for PCs and various other platforms.)
